headline: Welcome to Time 2 Trade!
confirmation: Your account has been created successfully.
multiProvider: Use magic links, Google, or X (coming soon) to sign in from any device.
tradingClockDescription: View real-time market sessions (Tokyo, London, New York) on an interactive clock.
economicEventsDescription: Track high-impact economic events and their potential market effects.
customizeExperienceDescription: Click the settings icon to customize sessions, colors, and timezones.
proFeaturesDescription: Custom alerts, advanced analytics, and API access will be available with premium plans.
defaultEventsNote: We've added NY Open and Market Close reminders to your clock. You can customize or remove them anytime.
